org.forgerock.commons.launcher

Class ConfigurationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.commons.launcher.ConfigurationUtil

extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • getJarFileListing

        public static Vector<URL> getJarFileListing(URL location,
                                            List<String> includes,
                                            List<String> excludes)

        Retrieve a list of filepaths from a given directory within a jar file. If filtered results are needed, you can supply a |filter| regular expression which will match each entry.

        Parameters:
        location -
        includes - to filter the results within a regular expression.
        Returns:
        a list of files within the jar |file|

      • getZipFileListing

                                            List<String> includes,
                                            List<String> excludes)

        Retrieve a list of filepaths from a given directory within a jar file. If filtered results are needed, you can supply a |filter| regular expression which will match each entry.

        Parameters:
        location -
        includes - to filter the results within a regular expression.
        Returns:
        a list of files within the zip |file|

      • substVars

        public static Object substVars(String val,
                               PropertyAccessor configuration)

        This method performs property variable substitution on the specified value. If the specified value contains the syntax &{<prop-name>}, where <prop-name> refers to either a configuration property or a system property, then the corresponding property value is substituted for the variable placeholder. Multiple variable placeholders may exist in the specified value as well as nested variable placeholders, which are substituted from inner most to outer most. Configuration properties override system properties.

        Parameters:
        val - The string on which to perform property substitution.
        configuration - Set of configuration properties.
        Returns:
        The value of the specified string after property substitution.

      • substVars

        public static Object substVars(String val,
                               PropertyAccessor configuration,
                               boolean doEscape)
